job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field

jd: From: Shivam, vkoresolutions shivam@vkoresolutions.com Reply to: shivam@vkoresolutions.com Hi Folks,Hope you are doing well. Job Title: Java Back-end DeveloperLocation: Austin, TX (On-site) We are looking for a Java Back-end Developer with strong experience in Java and Spring Boot, along with SAP tools and supply chain management .Key Responsibilities:Build and support back-end applications using Java and Spring Boot.Work with front-end developers to ensure everything works together.Use SAP tools to make our systems better.Help with supply chain tasks.Fix issues in existing applications.Must-Have Skills:Good Java programming skills.Experience with Spring Boot.Basic knowledge of SAP tools.Understanding of supply chain managements .Good problem-solving and communication skills.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.3+ years of Java development experience. Thanks,Shivam SharmaVkoresolutions LLC shivam@vkoresolutions.com 737-304-0779
